page.title: 18CHASE FARM HOSPITAL 2
page.content: Linen Room (Laundry is at Highlands Hospital).The Maternity Unit, built in 1975, includes the G.P. Unit and Family Planning Clinic.There is also a Child Care Unit and Psychiatric Unit. Chase Village, the Mental Handicap Unit, was built in 1976 for long-term patients, but with a small number of short stay beds for holiday relief etc. An isolation unit will be built in 1986.There is no Geriatric Unit. Geriatric beds are located at St. Michael's Hosspital, Chase Side.Spec- ialist Areas of Health Care not catered for at Chase Farm but referred on a regional basis are neurosurgery, kidney transplant/dialysis to Royal Free Hampstead, Opthalmology to North Middlesex and E.N.T. to Highlands. There are 28 wards and most have combined day/dining rooms with TV and smoking allowed.There are not usually
